name: Rhythm Rumble
summary: Rhythm Rumble is a groundbreaking mixed reality boxing practice game, tailored for VR aficionados. It offers a unique blend of physical exercise and rhythmic coordination, allowing players to hone their boxing skills in an immersive virtual environment. With intuitive controls synced to pulsating beats, every jab and hook feels like a dance. Experience the thrill of the ring as you train like a champion in Rhythm Rumble!
